blocks.name: bdayfo
blocks.content: The birthday function maps the surreals onto the ordinals. Alling's axiom (B). (Shortened proof on 2012-Apr-14, SF). (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm bdayfo() {
  |- wfo(cbday, csur, con0)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wfo(cbday, csur, con0), wfn(cbday, csur), wceq(crn(cbday), con0))
  mpbi(wfn(cbday, csur), wral(hs0, csur, wcel(cdm(cv(hs0)), universe)))
  rgen(hs0, csur, wcel(cdm(cv(hs0)), universe))
  dmexg(cv(hs0), csur)
  mptfng(hs0, csur, cdm(cv(hs0)), cbday)
  eqtr4i(crn(cbday), con0, cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, csur, wceq(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs0))))))
  rnmpt(hs1, hs0, cbday, csur, cdm(cv(hs0)))
  df-bday(hs0)
  abbi2i(hs1, con0, wrex(hs0, csur, wceq(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs0)))))
  impbii(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wrex(hs0, csur, wceq(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs0)))))
  sylancl(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wrex(hs0, csur, wceq(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c1o)), csur), wceq(cv(hs1), cdm(cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c1o)))))
  noxp1o(cv(hs1))
  eqcomi(cv(hs1), cdm(cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c1o))))
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c1o))), cv(hs1)), wne(csn(c1o), emptycls))
  snnz(c1o)
  1oex()
  dmxp(csn(c1o), cv(hs1))
  rspceeqv(hs0, cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c1o)), csur, cv(hs1), cdm(cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c1o))), cdm(cv(hs0)))
  dmeq(cv(hs0), cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c1o)))
  rexlimiv(hs0, csur, wceq(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs1), con0))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), csur), wi(wceq(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs1), con0)), wcel(cdm(cv(hs0)), con0))
  nodmon(cv(hs0))
  eleq1a(cdm(cv(hs0)), con0, cv(hs1))
  df-fo(cbday, csur, con0)
  diff.hs0.c(csur)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(csur)
  diff.hs1.c(cdm(cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.c(con0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c1o)))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c1o))))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(hs1), con0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bdayfo() {
  ‚ä¢ (bday : No ‚Ü† On)
} = {
  mpbir2an((bday : No ‚Ü† On), bday[Fn]No, ran(bday)= On)
  mpbi(bday[Fn]No, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà No, dom(hs0)‚àà ùïå))
  rgen(hs0, csur, dom(hs0)‚àà ùïå)
  dmexg(hs0, csur)
  mptfng(hs0, csur, dom(hs0), cbday)
  eqtr4i(ran(bday), con0, { hs1 | ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà No, hs1 = dom(hs0))})
  rnmpt(hs1, hs0, cbday, csur, dom(hs0))
  df-bday(hs0)
  abbi2i(hs1, con0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà No, hs1 = dom(hs0)))
  impbii(hs1 ‚àà On, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà No, hs1 = dom(hs0)))
  sylancl(hs1 ‚àà On, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà No, hs1 = dom(hs0)), (hs1 √ó { 1o })‚àà No, hs1 = dom((hs1 √ó { 1o })))
  noxp1o(hs1)
  eqcomi(hs1, dom((hs1 √ó { 1o })))
  ax-mp(dom((hs1 √ó { 1o }))= hs1, { 1o } ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  snnz(c1o)
  1oex()
  dmxp({ 1o }, hs1)
  rspceeqv(hs0, (hs1 √ó { 1o }), csur, hs1, dom((hs1 √ó { 1o })), dom(hs0))
  dmeq(hs0, (hs1 √ó { 1o }))
  rexlimiv(hs0, csur, hs1 = dom(hs0), hs1 ‚àà On)
  syl(hs0 ‚àà No, (hs1 = dom(hs0)‚Üí hs1 ‚àà On), dom(hs0)‚àà On)
  nodmon(hs0)
  eleq1a(dom(hs0), con0, hs1)
  df-fo(cbday, csur, con0)
  diff.hs0.c(csur)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(csur)
  diff.hs1.c(dom(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(con0)
  diff.hs0.c((hs1 √ó { 1o }))
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(dom((hs1 √ó { 1o })))
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 ‚àà On)
}
